!Mineral Trader Hitchi: Welcome! I don't mean to brag, but I'm a fourth-generation miner! I have the same name as my ancestor, "Mineral King Hitchi". People from far and wide would come to Shuttgart for his merchandise! Who knows? Maybe someday I'll be as rich as he was!
